Small preset menu for lunch: included an apetizer,  entre and drink for under 10€. And the quality you get for 10€ is a steal. You could easily pay 10€ for the entre alone at other restaurants especially if you're in a tourist area. Staff is over the top welcoming. Cozy relaxing ambiance. Its authentic, delicious food at a price locals would pay.Food was excellent. Tapas in the evening times.
